Plot: A transgender punk-rock girl from East Berlin tours the U.S. with her band as she tells her life story and follows the former lover/band-mate who stole her songs.
Writer: John Cameron Mitchell (book), Stephen Trask (book), John Cameron Mitchell (screenplay)
Title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 28 wins & 32 nominations.
Actors: John Cameron Mitchell, Miriam Shor, Stephen Trask, Theodore Liscinski
